mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER (MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_NUMBER, MEMBER_EMAIL, MEMBER_BIRTHDAY, MEMBER_ZIPCODE, MEMBER_ADDRESS1, MEMBER_ADDRESS2, MEMBER_PHONE, MEMBER_REGDATE, MEMBER_DELDATE, MEMBER_ONOFF, MEMBER_PASSWORD) VALUES(#{MEMBER_ID}, #{MEMBER_NAME}, MEMBER_NUMBER_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{MEMBER_EMAIL}, #{MEMBER_BIRTHDAY}, #{MEMBER_ZIPCODE}, #{MEMBER_ADDRESS1}, #{MEMBER_ADDRESS2}, #{MEMBER_PHONE}, SYSDATE, NULL, '0', #{MEMBER_PASSWORD})
